data.name: Msg_InvalidValue
data.value: Invalid value.

data.name: Msg_FieldRequired
data.value: This field is required.

data.name: Msg_Preparing
data.value: Preparing environment...

data.name: Msg_ValidationError
data.value: Please fill in all required fields.

data.name: Msg_InvalidPath
data.value: The specified process path is invalid.

data.name: Msg_InvalidWrapperExePath
data.value: Service wrapper executable not found.

data.name: Msg_InvalidStartupDirectory
data.value: The specified startup directory is invalid.

data.name: Msg_InvalidStartupType
data.value: The specified startup type is invalid. Options: Automatic, AutomaticDelayedStart, Manual, Disabled.

data.name: Msg_InvalidProcessPriority
data.value: The specified process priority is invalid. Options: Idle, BelowNormal, Normal, AboveNormal, High, RealTime.

data.name: Msg_InvalidStdoutPath
data.value: The specified stdout file path is invalid.

data.name: Msg_InvalidStderrPath
data.value: The specified stderr file path is invalid.

data.name: Msg_InvalidRotationSize
data.value: Rotation size must be a number of Megabytes (MB) greater than or equal to 1 MB.

data.name: Msg_InvalidDateRotationType
data.value: The specified date rotation type is invalid. Options: Daily, Weekly, Monthly.

data.name: Msg_InvalidMaxRotations
data.value: Max rotations must be a number greater than or equal to 0.

data.name: Msg_InvalidHeartbeatInterval
data.value: Heartbeat interval must be a number of seconds greater than or equal to 5 seconds.

data.name: Msg_InvalidMaxFailedChecks
data.value: Max Failed Checks must be a number greater than or equal to 1.

data.name: Msg_InvalidRecoveryAction
data.value: The specified recovery action is invalid. Options: None, RestartService, RestartProcess, RestartComputer.

data.name: Msg_InvalidMaxRestartAttempts
data.value: Max Restart Attempts must be a number greater than or equal to 1.

data.name: Msg_ServiceCreated
data.value: Service was created successfully.

data.name: Msg_ServiceRemoved
data.value: Service was removed successfully.

data.name: Msg_UnexpectedError
data.value: An unexpected error occurred.

data.name: Msg_AdminRightsRequired
data.value: Administrator privileges are required.

data.name: Msg_ServiceStarted
data.value: Service was started successfully.

data.name: Msg_ServiceStopped
data.value: Service was stopped successfully.

data.name: Msg_ServiceRestarted
data.value: Service was restarted successfully.

data.name: Msg_InvalidPreLaunchPath
data.value: The pre-launch process path is invalid.

data.name: Msg_InvalidPreLaunchStartupDirectory
data.value: The specified pre-launch startup directory is invalid.

data.name: Msg_InvalidPreLaunchStdoutPath
data.value: The specified pre-launch stdout file path is invalid.

data.name: Msg_InvalidPreLaunchStderrPath
data.value: The specified pre-launch stderr file path is invalid.

data.name: Msg_InvalidPreLaunchTimeout
data.value: Pre-Launch timeout must be a number of seconds greater than or equal to 5 seconds.

data.name: Msg_InvalidPreLaunchRetryAttempts
data.value: Pre-Launch retry attempts must be a number greater than or equal to 0.

data.name: Msg_ServiceDisabled
data.value: A disabled service with this name already exists. Choose a different name.

data.name: Msg_ServiceNotFound
data.value: The specified service was not found.

data.name: Msg_ServiceDisabledError
data.value: The specified service is disabled.

data.name: Msg_InvalidFailureProgramPath
data.value: The failure program path is invalid.

data.name: Msg_InvalidFailureProgramStartupDirectory
data.value: The specified failure program startup directory is invalid.

data.name: Msg_InvalidPostLaunchPath
data.value: The post-launch process path is invalid.

data.name: Msg_InvalidPostLaunchStartupDirectory
data.value: The specified post-launch startup directory is invalid.

data.name: Msg_InvalidStartTimeout
data.value: Start timeout must be a number greater than or equal to 1.

data.name: Msg_InvalidStopTimeout
data.value: Stop timeout must be a number greater than or equal to 1.
